indexPage.description2: Corona viruses are a type of virus. There are many different kinds, and some cause disease. A newly identified type has caused a recent outbreak of respiratory illness now called COVID-19.Lauren Sauer, M.S., the director of operations with the Johns Hopkins Office of Critical Event Preparedness and Response
